class.name: MultiMeshBullets2D
class.brief_description: This class is only meant to be inherited by other C++ classes. Never use this by its own. Always use the [BulletFactory2D], that's the only proper way.

method.name: disable_bullet
method.description: Disable a specific bullet from the multimesh Always call using call_deferred() to avoid issues

method.name: get_all_bullets_status
method.description: Get the status of all bullets inside the multimesh - whether they are enabled (active and visible on screen) or disabled (inactive and invisible)

method.name: get_amount_bullets
method.description: Get the amount of bullets inside the multimesh

method.name: is_bullet_status_enabled
method.description: Check the status of a specific bullet - whether it is enabled (active and visible on screen) or disabled (inactive and invisible)

method.name: push_multimesh_to_object_pool
method.description:
Push the entire multimesh to the object pool.
If there are still moving bullets inside the multimesh, they will be disabled first before pushing to the object pool
Warning: Always call using call_deferred() to avoid issues

members.member: You can edit the custom bullets data that the bullets multimesh was spawned with
